General.Name: Troy Resources Limited
General.Description: Troy Resources Limited engages in the exploration and production of gold in Australia and South America. It holds interest in the Karouni gold project located in Guyana. The company was incorporated in 1984 and is based in West Perth, Australia.
General.Address: 5 Ord Street, West Perth, WA, Australia, 6005

0.Name: Mr. Richard J. Beazley B.E., BE (Hons), FAICD, FAusIMM, M.A.I.C.D., M.B.A
